name: tlumaczenia-gatti
description: Home page of my mothers company

NODE_ENV.description: The environment can be: production, staging or development

NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION.description: By default Heroku sets this to true, if you are deploying a dev version of the code, set this false.

PORT.description: Set the port for development. Will be overwritten by Heroku for example

BT_PUBLIC_KEY.description: Braintree Public Key used in the front-end

BT_PRIVATE_KEY.description: Braintree Private Key used to finish the transaction in the back-end

SG_API_KEY.description: The API Key of Send Grid

EMAIL_TO.description: The default email used to send notifications to
